nodes.text: This female human was the mother of Resistance spy Vi Moradi. Whilst being interrogated for information about Captain Phasma's past, Moradi noted that Cardinal extended a straw on a bottle so that she could drink water just like her mother had when she was feverish whilst growing up on Chaaktil. By the time Vi was captured by the First Order Resurgent-class Star Destroyer Absolution, her mother had died.
